summary.span: 公开 ARM 系统的 select 指令集扩展。

span.span: Exposes select instruction-set extensions for ARM systems.

summary.span: 对于每个扩展，这些指令集表示为单独的类。

span.span: These instruction sets are expressed as separate classes for each extension.

summary.span: 可以通过查询相应类型上的 属性来确定是否支持当前环境中的任何扩展。

span.span: Support for any extension within the current environment can be determined by querying the property on the respective type.
